name: test_account_negative_scenarios[Sara Khan1]
description:
Test negative scenarios like Missing Fields.
    Uses 'accounts_api_manager' to authenticate, proving that even valid users
    cannot send invalid data (422 Unprocessable Entity).

parameters.name: row
parameters.value: {'tags': 'regression', 'scenario': 'missing fields', 'account_holder_name': 'Sara Khan', 'dob': '1996-05-28', 'gender': 'Female', 'email': 'sara.khan@example.com', 'phone': '+91-9988776655', 'address': '101 Jubilee Hills, Hyderabad, TS', 'zip_code': '', 'account_type': 'Savings', 'balance': '42000.00', 'status': 'Active', 'services': 'Cheque Book,Debit Card', 'marketing_opt_in': 'true', 'updated_account_holder_name': 'Sara Khan', 'updated_dob': '1996-05-28', 'updated_gender': 'Female', 'updated_email': 'sara.khan@example.com', 'updated_phone': '+91-9988776655', 'updated_address': '101 Jubilee Hills, Hyderabad, TS', 'updated_zip_code': '500033', 'updated_account_type': 'Savings', 'updated_balance': '50000.00', 'updated_status': 'Active', 'updated_services': 'Cheque Book,Debit Card,Internet Banking', 'updated_marketing_opt_in': 'true'}
